pkgmetadata.longdescription: A port of the Perl, and JavaScript versions of JSONPathsee http://goessner.net/articles/JsonPath/Based on on JavaScript version by Stefan Goessner at: https://goessner.net/articles/JsonPath/ http://code.google.com/p/jsonpath/and Perl version by Kay Rhodes at: http://github.com/masukomi/jsonpath-perl/Python3 compatibily by Per J. Sandstrom
